page.title: 11CELEBRATING BIRTHDAYS.
page.content:
The most popular way of celebrating a birthday is to have a party. You can send out invitations to your guests telling them where the party is to be held, the date, time and finish. The food which you have at parties is usually sandwiches, sausages on sticks, jelly, ice-cream, and a big birthday cake. Many different games are played such as Blindman's Buff, Musical Bumps, Musical Statues, and Sardines. Sometimes a conjurer or disco will entertain the children.
When the guests arrive they give the host a present and a birthday card. When they leave they are usually given some sweets and a piece of cake to take home. A party is a lot of fun with lots of clearing up afterwards!
